description: Number of orbits of length n in map whose periodic points come from A006954.
links: Y. Puri and T. Ward, Arithmetic and growth of periodic orbits, J. Integer Seqs., Vol. 4 (2001), #01.2.1.
formula: If b(n) is the (n+2)nd term of A006954, then a(n)=(1/n)* Sum_{d|n}\mu(d)a(n/d)
author: Thomas Ward (t.ward(AT)uea.ac.uk)
